content.question: Let f be the function given by <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>f</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo> <mi>x</mi> <mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mtext> </mtext><msup> <mi>x</mi> <mn>3</mn> </msup> <mo>−</mo><mtext> </mtext><mn>6</mn><msup> <mi>x</mi> <mn>2</mn> </msup> <mo>−</mo><mtext> </mtext><mn>15</mn><mi>x</mi> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4546@</annotation> </semantics> </math>. What is the maximum value of f on the interval <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mrow><mo>[</mo> <mrow> <mn>0</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>6</mtext> </mrow> <mo>]</mo></mrow> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3A09@</annotation> </semantics> </math> ?
